description: This table contains hold related information for orders that were held/unheld.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hold information category ID for an order record, which indicates a type of change to an order's hold status. Holding an order indicates that a medication should not have any doses administered for a specific or indefinite period of time.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual Hold


Manual Unhold

columns.description:

columns.name: MAR_SCHD_TIME_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The scheduled time source category ID for the order record that was used when the order was held or unheld.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


After Signing


MAR


After Verification


After Adjust Times


End of Day Rescheduling

columns.name: MAR_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result category ID for the order record, indicating the action shown in the medication administration record when holding or unholding the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Given


Missed


Refused


Canceled Entry


Held


New Bag


Restarted


Stopped


Rate Change


MAR Hold


MAR Unhold


Bolus


Push


Rate Verify


See Alternative


Paused


Pending


Automatically Held


Due

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user specified when holding (marking doses that should temporarily not be administered) or this order.

columns.name: RECORDED_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the current local instant when the order was held (marking doses that should temporarily not be administered)/unheld.

columns.name: HOLD_DURATION
columns.description: The numeric amount of the duration specified for holding an order.

columns.name: HOLD_DURATION_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hold duration unit category ID for the order record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Doses


Minutes


Hours


Days


Until manually unheld

columns.name: REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the reason specified when holding (marking doses that should temporarily not be administered)/unholding an order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: The comments entered when holding or unholding an order.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the ordering provider specified when holding (marking doses that should temporarily not be administered) or unholding this order.

columns.name: ORDER_SIGN_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sign action category ID for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Sign


Sign & Hold


Sign & Hold (Suppress Reason Popup)


Release Signed & Held


Pend / Save Work
